summary: WHILE PARKED IN A GARAGE THE CONSUMER ATTEMPTED TO USE THE KEYLESS ENTRY REMOTE BUT IT DID NOT UNLOCK THE VEHICLE.  THE CONSUMER THEN TRIED TO START THE VEHICLE BUT IT WOULD NOT START.  THE CONSUMER THEN OPENED THE TRUNK AND AT THAT TIME THE CONSUMER SMELLED A STRONG BURNING ODOR.  THE CONSUER THEN NOTICED THAT THE BLACK BOX, IMMEDIATELY ABOVE THE BATTER, BURNED.  TEH VEHICLE ALSO LEAKED OIL.   *AK  *NLM
